About Me

I have enjoyed over 30 years working in various roles in the financial services and information technology industry. This makes me uniquely qualified since I understand the business, the back-office operations, and the technology. I enjoy solving business problems and making businesses more efficient. It is also my pleasure to train others about technology and how to use it safely.

My specialties are cybersecurity, process improvement, workflow automation, transaction coordinating, and website development. I have an undergraduate degree in Liberal Studies with concentration in math, computer science and business from University of Central Florida. I also completed a six month bootcamp for Data Analytics and Visualization from University of Central Florida.

When I am not working, I love to read, take long walks, practice Pilates and go to the beach.

Services

Solving Business Problems with Technology Solutions

Cybersecurity

Helping your business to identify risks and to develop cybersecurity plans. I provide assistance to help protect financial and investment information.

Web Development

Having a web presence as a small business or realtor is a necessity today. If you already have a website, is it working for you?

Process Management

Streamline your business processes to be more efficient. I help you to review your business processes and identify pain points. Then I help implement solutions.

Workflow Automation

Doing the same tasks over and over again? After reviewing your processes, let me help you reclaim your time by automating repetitive tasks.

Transaction Coordinating

Let me help you grow your real estate business. From contract to close, I will keep up with your paperwork and make sure you meet all deadlines to close on time.

Training

Cybersecurity awareness? Microsoft Office apps? I can assist with training you and your staff to use technology and use IT safely.
